          <title>
            <string language="sl">Entropija in izmenjava toplote</string>
            <string language="en">Entropy and Heat Exchange</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entropie und Wärmeaustausch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Entropie et échange thermique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Troca da entropia e de calor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Entropia e scambio termico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανταλλαγή εντροπίας και θερμότητας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Intercambio de la entropía y de calor</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Izmenjava toplote med dvemi telesi in drugi zakon termodinamike.</string>
            <string language="en">Heat exchange between two objects and second law of thermodynamics in practice.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">entropija</string>
            <string language="en">entropy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">drugi zakon termodinamike</string>
            <string language="en">second law of thermodynamics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmeaustausch zwischen zwei Nachrichten und 
zweitem Gesetz von Thermodynamik in der Praxis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Échange thermique entre deux objets et deuxième 
loi de la thermodynamique dans la pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Troca de calor entre dois objetos e segunda lei do 
thermodynamics na prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scambio termico fra due oggetti e seconda legge di 
termodinamica in pratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανταλλαγή θερμότητας μεταξύ δύο αντικειμένων και του 
δεύτερου νόμου της θερμοδυναμικής στην πράξη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Intercambio de calor entre dos objetos y la segunda
ley de la termodinámica en la práctica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entropie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zweites Gesetz von Thermodynamik</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
